roleset.name: to speak ill of, slander
roleset.note: VILIFY-V NOTES: Member of Vncls judgement-33. frame by Perryn. (from vilify.01-v)

example.name: defame
example.text: The Nazi propaganda vilified the Jews.

roleset.name: disgusting
roleset.note: VILE-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. Related to revile-v, vilify-v (from vile.01-j)

example.text: For everything which was vile seemed connected with A Sin in the Making.
